Pre-Game Insights: Argentina plays Canada on July 9 in the 2024 Copa America in the United States. The match starts at 8:00 PM ET.
Argentina played Ecuador in its last contest and won by a final score of 1-1. The Argentina side took eight shots in the victory, equal to the defeated Ecuador side’s total.
Lisandro Martinez netted the only goal for his side in the match against Ecuador.
Canada knocked off Venezuela 1-1 in its most recent action on July 5, while outshooting Venezuela 16 to 12.
Jacob Shaffelburg scored Canada’s only goal on two shots.
With six goals in four matches, Argentina is fourth in the competition. On the flip side, Canada has conceded three goals in four matches, eighth in the competition.
In international matches the past two years, Argentina scored 38 goals (2.1 per game) and Canada gave up 21 goals (1.5 per game).
Canada has scored two goals in four matches in this tournament, and Argentina has allowed one goal in four matches.
In international matches the past two years, Canada scored 17 goals (1.2 per game) and Argentina allowed five goals (0.3 per game).
With six goals scored and one allowed, Argentina is third in the competition in goal differential. It was +33 the past two years.
With two goals scored and three conceded, Canada is ninth in the competition in goal differential. It was -4 the past two years.
